CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​StringBuilderExtensions
static public
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​StringBuilderExtensions

A static class for all the functions added to the StringBuilder type.

Functions
EntityEncodeAndAppend
public static void EntityEncodeAndAppend (
this StringBuilder output,
char input
)

Appends the input character to the StringBuilder with <, >, ", and & replaced by their entity encodings.

EntityEncodeAndAppend
public static void EntityEncodeAndAppend (
this StringBuilder output,
string input
)

Appends the contents of the input string to the StringBuilder with <, >, ", and & replaced by their entity encodings.

EntityEncodeAndAppend
public static void EntityEncodeAndAppend (
this StringBuilder output,
string input,
int offset,
int length
)

Appends the contents of the input string to the StringBuilder with <, >, ", and & replaced by their entity encodings.  Offset and length represent the portion of the input string to convert.

StringEscapeAndAppend
public static void StringEscapeAndAppend (
this StringBuilder output,
string input
)

Appends the contents of the input string to the StringBuilder with ', ", and \ escaped.

StringEscapeAndAppend
public static void StringEscapeAndAppend (
this StringBuilder output,
string input,
int offset,
int length
)

Appends the contents of the input string to the StringBuilder with ', ", and \ escaped.  Offset and length represent the portion of the input string to convert.
